name: DeepLSTM
paper: Anomaly Detection in ECG Time Signals via Deep Long Short-Term Memory Networks. DSAA
description: Deep recurrent neural network architecture with Long Short Term Memory (LSTM) units to develop a predictive model for healthy ECG signals. The probability distribution of the prediction errors from these recurrent models is further utilized to indicate normal or abnormal behavior.
bibtex: @INPROCEEDINGS{7344872,author={Chauhan, Sucheta and Vig, Lovekesh},booktitle={2015 IEEE International Conference on Data Science and Advanced Analytics (DSAA)}, title={Anomaly detection in ECG time signals via deep long short-term memory networks}, year={2015},volume={},number={},pages={1-7},doi={10.1109/DSAA.2015.7344872}}
